title: Quadratic Formula
content: For ax² + bx + c = 0, roots are x = [-b ± sqrt(b² - 4ac)] / (2a). Discriminant D = b² - 4ac determines nature.

title: Binomial Probability
content: P(k successes in n trials) = C(n,k) * p^k * (1-p)^(n-k)

title: Derivative Rules
content: Power rule: d/dx x^n = n x^{n-1}. Chain rule: d/dx f(g(x)) = f'(g(x)) * g'(x).

title: Common Mistake - Sign Errors
content: Students often forget the negative sign in quadratic formula or when expanding (a-b)^2.
